casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Edward L. MANNING Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 10, 2018

Craig A. Sullivan, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rita M. Shair, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 902, 172 A.3d 883 (2017), is denied.
